code-interpreter-v1.name: Python data analyst
code-interpreter-v1.instructions: Runs code as a Jupyter notebook cell. Strong data analysis angle. Can use complex visualisation to explain results. Return code as a single string cell (do not use multiple files).

nextjs-developer.name: Next.js developer
nextjs-developer.instructions: A Next.js 13+ app that reloads automatically (pages router). Create additional files/components as needed. Always include all created files in the response.

vue-developer.name: Vue.js developer
vue-developer.instructions: A Vue.js 3+ app that reloads automatically. Create additional files/components (.vue) as needed. Only when asked specifically for a Vue app. Always include all created files in the response.

streamlit-developer.name: Streamlit developer
streamlit-developer.instructions: A Streamlit app that reloads automatically. You can create additional modules/files and import them. Always include all created files in the response.

gradio-developer.name: Gradio developer
gradio-developer.instructions: A Gradio app. Gradio Blocks/Interface should be called demo. You can create additional modules/files and import them. Always include all created files in the response.
